org.lenskit.knn.user

Class UserUserItemScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.basic.AbstractItemScorer
      • org.lenskit.knn.user.UserUserItemScorer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScorer

    public class UserUserItemScorer
extends AbstractItemScorer

    Score items with user-user collaborative filtering.

    The detailed results returned by this scorer are of type UserUserResult.

        FIXME: MDE does not like this method.

        Parameters:

      • scoreWithDetails

        @Nonnull
public ResultMap scoreWithDetails(long user,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           Collection<Long> items)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScorer

        Score a collection of items and potentially return more details on the scores.

        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate scores.
        items - The item to score.
        Returns:
        The scores for the items. This result set may not contain all requested items. Implementations that support additional details will return a subclass of ResultMap that provides access to those details.

      • findNeighbors

        protected Long2ObjectMap<? extends Collection<Neighbor>> findNeighbors(@Nonnull
                                                                       UserHistory<? extends Event> user,
                                                                       @Nonnull
                                                                       LongSet items)

        Find the neighbors for a user with respect to a collection of items. For each item, the neighborhoodSize users closest to the provided user are returned.

        Parameters:
        user - The user’s rating vector.
        items - The items for which neighborhoods are requested.
        Returns:
        A mapping of item IDs to neighborhoods.
